definitions.definition: A person with limited mental capacity who can perform tasks and think only like a young child , in medical circles meaning a person who lacks the capacity to develop beyond the mental age of a normal five- to seven-year-old child.

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A person with limited mental capacity who can perform tasks and think only like a young child , in medical circles meaning a person who lacks the capacity to develop beyond the mental age of a normal five- to seven-year-old child.
